mfcc.name: Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficients
mfcc.about: One of the most used features in audio processing and analysis.

waveplot.name: Waveplot
waveplot.about: It is a plot of amplitude vs time.

spectrogram_linear.name: Linear Spectrogram
spectrogram_linear.about: A spectrogram is a visual way of representing the signal strength (loudness) of a signal over time at various frequencies.

spectral_rolloff.name: Spectral Roll-off
spectral_rolloff.about: It is a measure of the shape of the signal. It represents the frequency at which high frequencies decline to 0.
